item.title: Linux uses SSH password-free login
item.description: Now distributed clusters are very popular, often switch back and forth on different machines that is common. If each switch needs to enter a username and password, that is to crash the rhythm ah. Fortunately, ‘SSH-KEY’ gives us convenience, as long as the ‘master’ generates a ‘PUB_KEY’, and then copied to ‘clusters’, you can use’ssh hostname' directly later to quickly and easily switch to the machine that needs to operate
